prompt: Pastel voxel cloudscape background for a website hero. Soft, airy cloud shapes built from chunky voxel-like blocks with subtle pixel dithering, very low contrast. Clean sky with gentle cream-to-pale-blue gradient. Generous negative space centered for a large logo. No characters, no buildings, no terrain.
subject: blocky pastel clouds
style: soft voxel/pixel illustration, clean and premium, subtle dithering
composition: wide banner, clouds framing edges, large empty center area
palette: cream, warm off-white, pale sky blue, hints of soft gold
constraints: background-only; no text; no watermark; no logos; avoid busy detail; keep center area clear
negative: realistic photography; high contrast; neon; heavy grain; lens flare; copyrighted logos; text

prompt: Pastel cloud background tile. Seamless repeating pattern of soft voxel-like clouds on a pale cream sky. Subtle, low-detail, low-contrast, meant to sit behind UI elements.

style: soft voxel/pixel illustration, minimal, subtle dithering
constraints: seamless/repeating; no text; no watermark; no logos
negative: photorealism; harsh edges; high contrast; text
